segments.text: David , do you think we are lucky to have the weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Definitely . I need to have enough time to have a rest on this weekend . We worked like bees in the whole working days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree with you . What do you want to do , except sleeping ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me think . Oh , awful ! I still have not finished the chart which was assigned by Mr . Wharton on Friday . So that task will make my busy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am better . I will go out to have a visit to my aunt . Why don't we have fun on weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1
